website_summaries.verdict: These slip-on sneakers will maintain their appearance for an extended period of time.
pros: Gel-infused memory foam insoles ensure you can walk comfortably at all times
Knit mesh sneakers deliver an outstanding combination of style and function
Sold in a variety of stunning colors
cons: Elastic tends to come apart at the seams over time

customer_reviews.title: They fall apart
customer_reviews.text: Bought these Schetchers to use on a cruise. Wore them for 2 days and the elastic came apart at the seams. What good is comfort if they fall apart? Amazon no longer gives you an easy way to contact seller!
customer_reviews.author: harbordawg

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: By far, this is the most comfortable shoes from Skechers I have ever worn. At times,it is confusing to make sense of all the many names and series for their shoes. I was lucky! If you want :light weight,soft foot bed with memory foam,socks optional, and wear it out of the box? This shoes is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJohn C

customer_reviews.title: He needed something lightweight and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dad, who has Parkinson's. He needed something lightweight and easy to put on. Also, he needed something non-skid but not the big bulky soles you see on most athletic bottoms - as he shuffles when he walks so he can't have anything that "grabs" the carpet. These shoes worked out so well that he asked for a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: shopperK

customer_reviews.title: These go on and come off and wear like comfy slippers
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 13-D, so I ordered a 13-Medium. These go on and come off and wear like comfy slippers. Great all-round comfort and appropriate for casual dress or even working in the yard. Just beware that they don't repel water, so wearing in the rain isn't something you're likely going to want to do. :-) Would I reorder another pair or recommend them? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: T. Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but fell apart within 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe at first, but then falls apart. The cloth on the rear of the shoe behind your heal breaks away from the internal structure resulting in it getting "crunched up." Sketchers usually make a quality shoe, but these failed after six months. Poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: HalstattRolls

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!  VERY comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: To say that I'm impressed with these shoes is an understatement. I've only had them for a few days, so I can't attest to this product's longevity. I can however tell you that they fit as expected and when it comes to weight and comfort, these shoes are nothing short of amazing. (I let my brother try mine on. He was on his way to Amazon to purchase a pair of his own about five seconds after I pulled mine off his feet). I would definitely buy these again. (To be on the safe side, I might purchase a backup pair in the very near future). If your on the fence about buying these shoes, jump.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Davis

customer_reviews.title: Don't be a slipper wearing lazy dolt
customer_reviews.text: I first found these at a discount store but when I went back to get another set they did not have this style. So Amazon to the rescue. I found exactly the size I needed, order with prime and in two days I was in feet heaven. These feel just like slippers but without the stigma of being a slipper wearing lazy dolt. Would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: larry reisinger

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who has a lot of problems with his feet. He has bunions and arthritis. When he tried them on he couldn't believe how comfortable they were! They look very classy and he can wear them either for casual wear or when getting a little dressed up. He is now hinting for a second pair. The size is perfect and does not run small as I have read in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JaniceNY

customer_reviews.title: Tony Romo Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and I have difficulty tying my shoes and I struggle. These shoes are stylish looking, comfortable, fit to size and prompt receipt of product. These are probably the best sneaker shoes that I've ever worn. I received them this morning and I'm walking all over my house with them and they feel like I'm walking on two pillows. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM LACEY

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoe in the universe, but...
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable slip on, casual shoes and perfect it you wear wide shoes. However, make sure you order "at least" a half size smaller than your usual size. You may even find it necessary to order a full size smaller. I wear a size 11.5 W and even the size 11 W of this shoe is a little big. I like to wear them with a pair of thick hiking socks so that compensates for the oversize shoe (plus it makes them even more comfortable). Great shoes, I am a Skechers fan. I mean, if they're good enough for Ringo....
customer_reviews.author: M. Allums

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last very long.  Limited support.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes didn’t last very long and I keep twisting my ankle in them. The rubber sole is heavily worn after a few months of light use ( maybe 10-15 days of wearing these). I’m a fan of Sketchers, but this pair of shoes was disappointing for me. I donated them to goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Avoid: weak heel, soft sole.
customer_reviews.text: These slip-ons have a very weak structure around the heel. When you slip them on, the top edge of the heel folds over and causes discomfort. The fold happens inside the fabric, so it is a little tricky to undo. The only way around it it to keep the heel from folding with your finger or a shoe horn. Additionally, these shoes are wider than I expected and the sole is soft, leading to a bit of wobble which, from my experience with other shoes that had the same problem, can lead to knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: JayInTX

customer_reviews.title: Just about perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this same shoe. Loved the first pair so much, I wanted another pair. This pair was received and fit a little small. I think they may stretch out with time, but not quite as comfy as the first pair. These shoes are for lounging and short walks. Do NOT try to use them as long walk or exercise shoes. They will likely cause sore feet from lack of sufficient padding, but around the house, running errands, casual social occasions, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: denny48

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for standing in the OR for hours
customer_reviews.text: As a Surgical PA, I was seeking a shoe to lessen the foot pain following a long day of standing in the OR. I was recommended these by a friend and they have been a godsend. The memory foam works wonders and has stayed comfortable for nearly a year now. My feet feel fresh and pain free even after the longest days. Absolutely recommended to anyone in a similar work situation requiring prolonged periods of standing.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. I ordered 1 full size smaller as suggested By other reviews. I am ordering another pair soon. I have given them several days or normal wear. I just today put in a soft sole insert, and now even better than b4. Do your self a favor and order. I am 71 and I walk each day, and stay active. My new for sure shoes! I don’t think they are a good idea for bad Weather( snow )... but all else I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Gil L.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these in various colors. They all look great, and feel great, for about three months or so. Then, they get loose and my foot slides around inside. The textured material also holds dirt so they are very hard to clean. That's the great compromise with these materials - shoe leather lasts a long time because you can clean and polish until it looks new again. But, it's not as light and comfortable as these. So, if you are OK with buying a new pair every three months or so, these are for you. If you want shoes that last a long time, you want good old fashioned hard leather.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After wearing for 2 days (avg 5 hours each day) they became extremely uncomfortable causing knee and back pain. Would not recommend these to anyone and for the price you would think they would be good for more than 10 hours. I would never recommend Skechers to anyone!! This is the 2nd pair of Skechers sneakers I have had problems with soon after purchase. I think I will stick with Nike!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and soft but not real supportive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use around the house in the winter. The rest of the year, I wear a pair of recovery sandals around the house. (Recovery sandals are sort of like earth-sandals...they soften the heel strike when walking and thyey have a lot of arch support.) These are comfortable but they are not recovery sandals. They are uniformly soft and have very little arch support. They are super easy to put on though and are generally comfortable. I recommend that you wear socks with these because, with several other pairs of sketchers I've owned, the cloth lining tends to stick to my feet and bunch up when I wear them barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Hodgepodgerama

customer_reviews.title: Don't get wet!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a small spot on one of these, applied some mile soap and then rinsed. There appeared an ugly jagged line all through the upper part of the shoe when it dried. I re-rinsed, now three times, and the ugly large, jagged line keeps moving around the shoe, but is still there. I guess these shoes do NOT react well to water. WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Another Comfortable Sketchers Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Sketchers slip-on shoes for quite a while. They're VERY comfortable and all of the Sketchers I've purchased have withstood normal abuse. It's nice that they make a Wide size for many of their shoes. Putting on these shoes is like stepping into blissful coziness. I purchased one pair in this model. Once I felt how comfortable they are, I purchased two more pairs in different colors. My 3-year-old canvas Sketchers will be retired to yard work, car washes, etc. Highly recommend most any model of Sketchers shoes. Your feet will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: lawdog

customer_reviews.title: Save money by ordering this shoe first.
customer_reviews.text: I have severe arthritis. Knee replacement gave me little relief. I've tried a number of shoes, moccasins, slippers, and loafers. Until now, none gave me any relief. This shoe has helped reduce pain of walking so much that I bought another pair. I hope this recommendation will serve others as well. It would have saved me money if I'd tried them first.
customer_reviews.author: Dow Wynn III

customer_reviews.title: HOT & not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ONLY based on the numerous reviews that said these slippers were NOT hot & very breathable. Well, maybe in the winter in Canada that might be true but here near Tampa these make my feet feel like they're on fire after about 15 minutes of wearing them around the house. My kids get a kick out of when I start yelling "hot feet, hot feet" & knock off the slippers in a hurry. What a waste of money--my first pair of Sketchers, EVER, & definitely my last.
customer_reviews.author: StillaYankee

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Very interesting. From a construction/support standpoint I would describe the shoe as 1/2 way between a typical casual slip on shoe and a foam slipper. Extremely lightweight. Very little support. Very comfortable. Maybe runs 1/2 size longer than typical sizing. I like the looks and comfort. Very appropriate for casual dress, errands, shopping, visiting friends, going to dinner etc. Shoe probably does not provide enough support to wear to an event where there might be some casual sports/athletic participation by the wearer. I am a little skeptical about how the shoes will hold up long term but as a nice looking casual shoe to wear for many occasions, I like them and am glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Armchair Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Everything can be as expected, and it still not be right.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the shoes were as represented. Actually, they were lighter than I thought they'd be, more like bedroom slippers than shoes. I can't report as to the durability of the plastic soles, but the shoes slid on easily and fit my 13EE width feet just fine. But I was looking for a walking shoe, and these didn't feel like they'd last long. Besides, these things, once on, were butt ugly! My partner took one look and said "Oh No you are not ever wearing those things!" and I had to agree. Now I'm trying to return them and Amazon would refuse the review if I told you what was going on about that!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This model of Sketchers is, well....perfect.
customer_reviews.text: If, IF, you are looking for a truly comfortable shoe, this is it. Support in the insole? This is it. Good looks? This is it. Wide in the toe box? This is the one. Want a quick on/off shoe without the aggravation of laces dangling? Yep, it's this one. in fact, this is the most comfortable shoe I have experienced..ever. Don't pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiasm enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Love these Shoes
customer_reviews.text: What great comfortable shoes! I also have Skechers Go Walks and frankly I like these better. I live in Florida so the weight and airieness is super. I have also ordered and received 2 more pairs in different colors, so I am a believer. I also want to add that although I indicated the shoes fit as expected, in truth they just might be just a tad large. I am a big guy, and my foot size is a little tough to fit. That said....I love the fit of these shoes for me.
customer_reviews.author: Drago

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Ease
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and another pair of Sketchers for my dad who has Parkinson's. If you have dealt with that, you will understand the aspect of a good sturdy comfortable shoe that they can easily take off and put on is very important. Also, with the way that he walks this shoe offers enough support and fit to not come off as he sometimes shuffles. I own a few pair of Sketchers and they are my go to shoe except for time at the gym or in a formal setting. They are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Canter

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, run a little large
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a 14W, as I am comfortable in a 14 2E athletic shoe (NB). The 14W Sketchers were ridiculously too large, and I returned them after wearing a few minutes on the carpet. Replaced them with 13W. These are a little loose, but I don't walk out of them. I wear them all day, and they are the most comfortable shoe I have worn in years. Maybe these shoes run large in "Yeti" sizes ? I am 79, 6'-3" and 209 #.
customer_reviews.author: J and G G

customer_reviews.title: Well made, correct sizing, and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly. I wear a 9.5 size and the width and length was exactly right. The innersole is soft and comfortable. As a shoe for general use, I can't complain. The sole is solid with no defects. Material is very good, again with no issues or defects. Walking, the shoe doesn't slip and conforms to my walk. On wet deck wood, the soles had good grip with no slippage. I walked on my gravel driveway and it was comfortable, just as if I was walking on the concrete street. I would rate these as a ten. Hopefully they will be durable and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Borrelli

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, manufa
customer_reviews.text: They look like crap. It's like two different shoes. The tips of the shoes are stitched different. The one has a flat top and the other has a pointed top. Made in crap China on a Friday afternoon. Do not buy, they are not the same shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, Runs big, Very light and Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Skechers. Reasonably priced. Arrived quickly. Very clean and stylish look. The shoe seems to run big, but not big enough to send back for a refund. Fit is a little loose with my Summer socks. For some reason, they are uncomfortable to stand in place with for 10+ mins, but are extremely comfortable when walking. Have had them less than a week. Use them around the house and for short dog walks. Hopefully these will last years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love 'em. What else can I say. They are so light. Fit great...maybe they run slightly small. I originally ordered a half-size larger and returned them [which by the way is incredibly easy now with Amazon's return policy]. This half-size smaller shoe fits perfect. I wear them everywhere. Honestly, they feel like I'm wearing a slipper. They are so comfortable you can forget you have them on. Gee, I feel like a commercial. Honest, I'm just a happy purchaser who likes the shoes. And they were not even expensive so that's a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Dameron

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on air
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked sketchers and slip-ons so I gave these a try. They are ultra light, comfy, stable, and look great. These wouldn't be optimal in a factory, forest, or severe weather. They are not meant to be protective in any way, as far as I can tell. Wear these at the office or around town. I have been wearing these daily at work for about 10 hours per day, I walk a good amount at work. One review took a star off because something happened after 1 year...SMH. I plan on replacing after one year max. For the price, that seems very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Randy W

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be around the house shoes while telecommuting during COVID because my feet had started hurting all the time from walking barefoot on hard floors for so many hours. The foam sole and memory foam/gel liner of these are super comfortable, the slip-on style has just the right amount of hold, and the breath-ability of these are great. I will put them on first thing in the morning and wear them until I go to bed way too many hours later. I would definitely buy these again and am just as pleased, if not more so, as I have been with all of my other Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the shoes specifically for walking around Disney World / Universal and I was not impressed at all. First day I had low cut socks and I got so irritated on the back of the heel that it made the rest of the trip unbearable. Basically my skin got rubbed off in a couple of spots and then developed a rash even with higher socks to cover those spots and a band-aid. Would def not recommend for an amusement park shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Catalin D. Antonescu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent slip ons
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for my wide feet. I bought them to wear with socks & when they arrived, the fit was exactly as described. Very easy to slip into. Feels like walking on a cloud. Bottoms are very god for gripping surfaces & I take long walks with them. They don’t hurt my feet. I recommend them & will order other colors if available.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an earlier design that I liked very well. (sorry, but the model number has faded) These were constructed similarly but seem more robust thanks to a thicker and more tread-like outsole. Colors were limited thanks to my choice of size.(10.5, wide fit) but the gray works just fine. 100% satisfied. They fit like comfortable slippers but grip very well outdoors. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: Skechers.. Never met er!
customer_reviews.text: I was a sceptic. But after seeing Tony Romo advertising these slip on shoes I thought I would try them out. I have never thought about purchasing Skechers in my life. That all being said.. I took a chance. Well.. I love these shoes. They are so comfortable it is hard to explain. Almost like house shoes but not. I wear no see socks with them and they are very stylish. I have had complements and I highly recommend them for anyone who is in need of comfort and stylish footwear.
customer_reviews.author: JR.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly large in my size 11M but OK with thicker socks.  OVERPRICED!
customer_reviews.text: In 11M weight on accurate scale is 8 oz. Zappos shows 7 oz. Sole is a little slippery, its a spongy texture. I have nothing to do with TSLA or Tesla but their similar shoe in which I have been using for 2 yrs. weigh 7 oz. in this size and have a very good anti slip sole and fit me perfect in 11M but as of now are not available in black. I do not think you could go wrong with either shoe. Lite weight and well balanced but overpriced in my opinion. Stain easily, rubber soles and rubber stretch material of poor wear quality. OVER PRICED! BUT, I bought mine for under $40.
customer_reviews.author: Robert by the sea

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't want to bend over to tie shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the hope that I'd be able to slip them on and off without bending over. Some slip-ons might require you to bend to get them on... these have been just great to slip on without bending! The one drawback is that maybe they're a little loose width-wise. For reference: I have fairly narrow feet, so I usually tie laces tightly. I have some slip-on snow clogs from Salomon that don't feel loose though. These are comfortable, I've walked a few dozen miles in them already and even done a little bit of jogging & no problems there.
customer_reviews.author: SeanGalt

customer_reviews.title: Do not wear during rain, your feet will get wet 100% guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the shoes themselves are a good fit, maybe a little bit loose; so I have to wear two pairs of socks for them to fit "snuggly. When in the rain, they feel like you're wearing a $50 padded t-shirt, they're very lite BUT, they do not stop, repel, or do nothing other than embracing H20 head on, straight into your feet/socks they look cool tho so... that makes up for it? nah. I wouldn't buy these again, but I will continue to use them until they tear apart.
customer_reviews.author: The Lionheart

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is too warm to wear, watch out for Amazon on returns
customer_reviews.text: Shoe does not breath so feet get very warm . Materials are not mentioned in write-up but I suspect spun recycled plastic. Would be a great shoe with canvas upper. Amazon advertises no charge for returns of clothing items and this was specifically noted with this purchase. However when time to return came up charged $6 for UPS pick-up. I live at least 20 miles from nearest UPS office so I paid but that is not free. They should say, free when returned directly to UPS.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aylott

customer_reviews.title: Very light comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I know these reviews are useful to potential buyers. These are very comfortable shoes. I wear them all the time with or without socks. Definitely worth the money the most comfortable shoes you can buy. I bought two pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Frank McCourt

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty wide
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these shoes and to find a shoe like this in a wide width seemed perfect. My normal shoe size in 10.5 4E so these Skechers looked like they would work perfectly and they did for the first couple of wearings. However, soon after wearing them they began to stretch and now they are pretty much impossible to wear. If I wear heavy boot socks they will stay on my feet but any thinner socks will cause them to slip off. If I could do it over again I would order a 10 instead of a 10.5 size.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Real comfy and nice looking and so far durable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable, I choose to wear them more than any other shoes I have! The color and shape are also elegant, and they go with many of my pants real well. I ordered grey color. Other than exercise walks, the shoes are ideal. I tried them however once in my exercise walks and found that my foot slides forward irritating the longer toes. I am not sure why in long walks this happened, because there are no such problems when I am not exercising. So I recommend these shoes without reservation for light walks and lounging and short walks. They so far are holding their shape beautifully, a real plus in this category of footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Medicidela

customer_reviews.title: Order a .5 size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Order a .5 size larger. Mine came in after being lost in the mail for three weeks. Literally got a email from Amazon stating the shoes had been lost. So they sent me another order. I wear a 9.5. These were marked as 9.5 but where a 10. I did not want to go through the whole waiting process and return these shoes. If I wear thick socks they fit okay. But these were bought as house shoes. I leave my regular shoes outside due to the covid19. Overall they are comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Beerhappy

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wide feet and is usually hard to fit. The fact these came in wide sizes were a plus from the get go. They are made from a nice breathable fabric and THEY ARE WASHABLE! My husband had a pair that were similar to these and I was hoping I could replace the worn out ones with these! It was a success. The memory foam pad is removable (not sure why you would want to other than to wash them maybe. I would like to order a pair of these for women! :-)
customer_reviews.author: whirlwind

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  First shoes i ever bought that didn't have to be "broken in"
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! I like Skecher's products but these shoes are just about perfect. I wanted to replace my house shoes which were wearing out. These do the job. These are the very first pair of slip-on shoes I've ever had that I could put on the first time without using a shoe horn and which after wearing them daily for a couple of weeks haven't gotten loose. They didn't need to be broken-in - they were very very comfortable right from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Quick Review: Skechers Men's Equalizer Double Play Slip-On Loafer
customer_reviews.text: I tried on a whole bunch of Skechers in the store, they were all odd colors and standard widths that wouldn't fit, so I ordered online. These 9 WIDE came fairly quickly and fit as expected: just right! The inner sole is glued down and a bit thin, so I don't know how long they will last, but so far so good, and comfortable, very light weight. Great for around the house. Good price too, equal to sales prices at the discount stores (sorry merchants).
customer_reviews.author: G Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, Sized Right, Cushy Padded Insole
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a glove and I love the cushy sole. My last pair were a more relaxed fit - they might have been a wide. These were not a wide and have a fitted feel with the right amount of flex to have plenty of room to move. I was surprised that they have very little arch support compared to my old Sketchers that were a different model. I didn't even notice till I looked inside after wearing them all day. They're just for walking around and they are plenty comfortable for a lot of that.
customer_reviews.author: CWtexas

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: This will be the 3rd pair I have owned in 2 years. It is not a shoe that will last you a long time. I sit at a desk most of the day but when I need to walk it provides a good cushion. Over the last 2 years I have gone through 2 pairs by alternating them every other day or week. After wearing out the cushion in them I have bought another pair. I would estimate these to last about 6 months to a year if I wear them every day. Not a bad price to pay if you only buy a pair of shoes for leisure walking and support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of sketchers "fisherman's" sandals or "water" sandals that I liked to use to slip on quickly when I just needed to run errands, etc. I had them for 13 years give or take. They were done long before I finally tossed them out. I didn't want that style again (they were a gift from my mom), but I wanted something much more comfortable in a slip on shoe. This fit that perfectly. I can walk for a decent trek and my feet were still comfortable. Really, for now, they're more comfortable than my Nike sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Stasio

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Since I am home now 100% of the time, I wanted a pair of shoes that I could wear around my home and not feel like they were shoes (does that make sense?). In any event, I read the reviews on Sketchers, and I thought, why not? Well, I am so happy that I ordered these shoes. The slip-on sketchers are incredibly comfortable, light and do not feel like you are wearing shoes in your home. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Aliama

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, Very very poor support
customer_reviews.text: The heel in way to soft and I have come close to falling a few times trying to walk on uneven surfaces. This is an update because I need to be precise about this problem shoe. It looks good and it’s light and whisks away any moisture. However, I’m warning everyone that this shoe is dangerous most especially for seniors who may already have some balance issues. This shoe does NOT support you. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pair of Slip On Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've worn many slip on shoes over the years and I bought this pair for the main purpose of wearing around the yard. These are very comfortable, easy to slip on (even in humid conditions). I use while mowing and gardening and then throw them under the hose to rinse off and they clean up very good. I've also used while biking, grocery shopping, dog walks, even to the office....they look great, feel great and definitely are my favorite pair up to this point.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Careful of size
customer_reviews.text: Typical quality by Sketchers. I love their shoes - I own 5 different styles. These shoes are a bit wide for me, but I have a medium to narrow size 11 1/2. My foot tends to slide forward and my big toe touches the front. I bought another size 12 and length is perfect, but now too wide. I can wear both sizes and will keep them but will not spend the entire day walking in them. Quality and looks are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jimfrompa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby but they run just a bit large, so I sent them back for a half size smaller. No big problem as Amazon always is willing to help in such matters. But as for the shoe itself, he said it felt so soft (and he's a very picky person) also it is wide in the toe box so that's good. He loved the color so I sent the pair back and ordered another just like he had, in the different size.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy S.

customer_reviews.title: The Most Comfortable Shoes I've bought in years
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen and decided to try these shoes because of the great reviews given to them by other purchasers. I've worn them for several weeks now and I am thrilled with my purchase. These shoes have memory foam inserts, a mild arch support and a thick, cushioned sole. I use them for taking walks and for slippers in the house. They are, without a doubt, the most comfortable shoes I own at this time. I am a very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Akin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, fit perfect and a nice water shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an off brand made in China which as we all know fits way too tight on American feet. These Skechers fit perfect just a tad bit loose but that's expected, very comfortable. The other brand was half the price and I got what I paid for, way too tight, and very basic and manufactured. Skechers on the other hand karma an excellent quality build, and a perfect fit, thank you USA!
customer_reviews.author: WWMiller

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Despite being larger than I'd expected (I normally wear 10.5 or 11, but even the 10.5 is slightly large on me), it's a very comfortable product. I wear it out to the store or on errands and it's quite comfortable. The memory foam in-sole cradles my feet while I walk and the rest of the shoe stretches to fit the shape of my foot. I can't imagine the shoe being great for heavy use, as I feel it isn't sufficiently durable, but for the uses I listed above, I think it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I needed some slippers/house shoes that are nice and comfortable to put on when I get home form a long on my feet. A coworker recommended these and I gave them a shot. One thing you need to realize after you buy these is that you need to expect a short break-in period. After a few hours of wear these shoes are sooo comfortable. I wear them around the house, but I will be buying a pair to wear around outside the house in casual situations.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly. What's nice is that the pair I got don't feel tight anywhere or cause friction or repeated uncomfortable rubbing every time I walk. I think that's the first time that's ever happened for me with a shoe purchase. Unfortunately, that's probably just dumb luck but after these wear out eventually I'll definitely consider buying a replacement and hope I get lucky again.
customer_reviews.author: Benedict A. Varga

customer_reviews.title: Neuropathy Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from peripheral neuropathy, most especially in my feet. There are many types of shoes I just cannot wear at all. What a relief to slip these shoes on! The gel cushioning is sheer heaven. My feet do slip just a bit too much in the heal region, so perhaps next time I will try going down half a size. Love these shoes! Will definitely purchase a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Blackbearfamily

customer_reviews.title: The wide fit is true to its name
customer_reviews.text: I have duck feet - narrow in the back and wide at the toes. At the toes they are wide and fabric is flexible to give my toes plenty of room. The insoles also feel like walking on padded carpet. I wouldn't want to dig ditches in them or anything but for walking all day on a hard surface they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: William Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Extremely narrow, couldn't even get my foot inside. I've worn 13W all my adult life, this is the first pair I have run into this issue with. I knew when I got them out of the box there would be an issue just looking at the narrowness of the sole. I confirmed this when I tried to put one on.
customer_reviews.author: Talorin

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe that fits right
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, the first bought some time ago, so that should say it all. I still wear the first pair, but pain splatters and other self-inflicted imperfections made them unsuitable for anything but work around the house. They still do the job, otherwise, so I bought this second pair for going out. Comfortable, easy on and off, good support, and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mccandless

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My sons call these my old man shoes. They can call them whatever they want because these are the most comfortable shoes I’ve bought in years! The wide width & the memory foam inserts make my feet feel right at home. They’re the only shoes I’ve worn since I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Heel stays up when I slip it on- a big plus- comfortable and no rubbing the wrong way Upon further testing the shoe is very comfortable the liner comes out pretty easily which is not so good and the shoes smell- all my shoes have some odor but these are standouts regarding stinch..
customer_reviews.author: Florida Sun

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers fit the width but may be .5 too small, a good choice overall though
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. Light, super comfy, easy slip-on, wide enough. First, I have EE wide feet; and these fit. Sketches seems to be a solid choice for wide feet in general. The issue I had with these is I ordered these in the same size have other Sketchers and they were just a tad too small to wear comfortably. I sent them back and re-ordered a half size larger and they are great. For the money, it would be hard to beat these.
customer_reviews.author: JOB

customer_reviews.title: They fit like you think they should
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe wide when I saw the commercial that Howie Long made. I have ordered Skechers before and even though I liked them you never knew what you were going to get. sometimes to narrow, sometimes to short. The wide shoes seem to be the correct size and length. I had to go to arch supports a few years back and the wide shoe accepts them. Go with the wide Skechers if you can. Much better!
customer_reviews.author: bigenewton63

customer_reviews.title: The lightest shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wore a Sketcher slip on loafer for casual wear for the last 6 years and very happy about it. I decided to get another Sketcher slip on loafer to replace the old shoe a month ago. I order the Skechers Men's Equalizer Double Play Slip-On Loafer men's size 7.5 and it did fit nicely. The shoe is very light and comfortable to wear. It feel like walking on sponge when I wore it for casual use. The only question left is how long will this shoe last compare to my last Sketcher.
customer_reviews.author: Ming L. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and support for a slip on.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to be indoor shoes I could slip on to avoid continually tracking dirt into the house. I wide, size 12 feet, and these fit perfectly, which is unusual in my size. They’re comfortable, easy to slip on and off, and offer a decent amount of support for such inexpensive shoes. I’ve tried buying inexpensive shoes for around the house before, and none have worked as well as these.
customer_reviews.author: Trumpet 7

customer_reviews.title: Men's Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these Skechers for my husband because I have several pairs of Skechers which I really like. My husband was making slip on shoes out of the several older pairs of tennis shoes, and his alternate was a pair of worn out mule sandals. He is very pleased with his pair of Skechers, and I haven't seen him wear the tennis shoes or sandals since.
customer_reviews.author: Birdlady10000

customer_reviews.title: Don’t make a mistake.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is the most uncomfortable shoe I have ever worn. The lack of support tends to cause my foot to pronate. The lack of arch support makes my flat feet more pronounced. I’ve worn bedroom slippers with better support. Don’t even think about wearing these things on rocky or gravel drives. I do not recommend these shoes to anyone other than a millennial with perfect feet.
customer_reviews.author: clink

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for around the house, in place of slippers. They are comfortable and fit well. Plus, I saw actor Stephen Amell wearing the exact same pair in an episode of Arrow a couple years back. Got a kick out of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: No arch support at all. Not a walking shoes. My feet hurts after just 1/2 mile walking. Not enough space to put custom insoles in to fix that. Other than that they look great, very light, snug fit true to size, easy on/off. So all the pro's are really useless because of the 1 con mentioned. Would not buy again and would not recommend to anyone who plans to walk with them.
customer_reviews.author: Evelina

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband as a gift to get him out of Crocs. Blah! He wears Crocs because he has vasculitites and needs support but not a too tight fit. Bought him 13W (fits true to size). He's worn them three days in a row and he said they are super comfortable and loves them! I'm going to buy him another paid! Win for him and definitely a win for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mjgurney2111

customer_reviews.title: Right shoe wider than left
customer_reviews.text: Really liked shoes. Had initially tried left shoe of all three pairs ordered. All fit. When I wore this pair, discovered the right shoe was much wider than the left. Almost lost shoe off my right foot multiple times. Unfortunately was in situation that I had to wear these shoes at an event. Will probably shy away from further purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Randy McConnaughey

customer_reviews.title: Very durable yet flexible
customer_reviews.text: The comfort and construction of these shoes is impressive. The flexibility offers excellent stability and support when walking. These shoes are very easy to put on an slip back out of. No lacing needed for a secure fit because of the way in which these shoes feel... as though they adapted to the contours of my feet. I purchased a second pair in case they are discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Miller

customer_reviews.title: A little more narrow than I expected but a VERY comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty wide feet and have trouble finding a slip on that fits snug without being too tight. These fit the best I've found so far. Additionally they stretch well and breath well. I like them so much I am going to get a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney A.

customer_reviews.title: Casual Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I buy them to wear around the yard. They seem a little loose but I have narrow feet. I wish there was a narrow width available but slip on shoes all see to go wide or wider not the opposite. They look like slippers to me instead of shoes. A waterproof version would be nice. These look like they would absorb a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have bone spurs in my heels (no, I'm not related to Trump) and this little shoe with its gel-infused inner soles makes walking relatively pain free. Very comfortable, durable and practical shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Luggs

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs of these loafers. One in regular and one in wide. Both fit though the wide has more room. The soles of these things have a cushion in them and are very comfortable. The shoes are light and its like walking on air. Like a lot of sketchers. I have 2 different pairs of the golf shoes too, and they are the most comfortable golf shoes ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: JM SmithTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, Twice
customer_reviews.text: First, I am not a big dude. I normally wear size 8 (U.S.) Wide. I have high arches. I was told to try a half size smaller and did. The 7.5 wide fit me perfectly. Very comfortable, great support, easy to put on and keep on all day with normal activity. Standing long periods, walking in stores, lounging, gatherings, all good. Haven't worn for very long walks, hiking, yet. Spilled dark soda on them. Wiped with a damp wash cloth. Dried quickly and no stain.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

customer_reviews.title: I've owned a vew pair of these now.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair were purchased in a local shoe store. I liked them so much that when I needed new shoes again I ordered them online from Amazon, only in a different color. The shoes literally arrived the next day. I was pleasantly surprised. I will continue to buy these shoes again in the future. I walk 20,000+ each day and they wear well for how much they are put to the test.
customer_reviews.author: HeathfromIndiana

customer_reviews.title: Preliminary Review
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived in a timely manner. They fit very well and are quite comfortable. Just what I was looking for in an around-the-house shoe. All that's left is how well they wear and how easy they are to clean. Even though there is no arch support they feel good to walk in. I will update this if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to begin but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for work (ICU nurse) they began to fall apart after less than 3 months. Within 4, the insoles had worn through completely to the outer sole. Comfortable to begin but poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: jimrtmn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Easy
customer_reviews.text: I usually require a mild arch support. The first time I wore these shoes, I noticed the lack of arch support. The main discomfort is the inside of my knees. I added a pair of thin insoles with mild support, and all is well. Cushioning, comfort and the convenience of a slip on. Couldn’t expect anything more.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: I am 64 years and these really are by far the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. Skechers Men's Equalizer. If they keep making them I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lemay

customer_reviews.title: As Comfortable as a Cloud!
customer_reviews.text: Great, lightweight shoe. Size runs slightly small---order next 1/2 size larger for optimum fit. I take a EE (wide) in wither 9.5 or 10.0, so I ordered the 10 EE and it fits wonderfully, allowing for barefoot, athletic sock, or thicker crew/dress sock use. Feels good, stable walking platform, looks great! If I need another color in future, I will definitely buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Appinhighlander

customer_reviews.title: very light
customer_reviews.text: ****8 months update. I wear these daily. They are only beginning to show a little wear. I'm a big guys, so these are pretty impressive. I probably wouldn't go hiking thought a bunch of sticks all the time because they might snag though.***** it's so light that it felt flimsy and cheaply made at first. I don't think that is the case.... but it is way lighter than any other shoes I've ever had. I don't think I'd want to run in them though.
customer_reviews.author: random hobbies guy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable walking shoes. I wear them every day for a 45 min. walk, and so far the soles seem to be wearing very slowly. I like the way they look, the soles are very shiny and dorky looking at first, but once you get them a bit dirty they dull up a bit and you don't feel like such a dork. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: More Slipper than Shoe
customer_reviews.text: While these are comfortable to wear they offer no support, especially no arch support. They feel more like slippers than a shoe. I guess they're good to slip on real quick for ease but made more for a flat-foot than one with any kind of an arch and my feet would be pretty sore after a long walk in these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fan of Skechers shoes and I wanted something to wear with shorts that was easy to slip on and off. These shoes fit the bill. I ordered a 11 1/2 which is the size of my other Skechers shoes, but wish I had gone 1/2 size up for additional length. Comfortable out of the box, and I wear these shoes every day.
customer_reviews.author: DouginNC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but size was off.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was a half-size smaller for me. Ordered the 9.5 and my foot came out of them. Ordered the 9's, fit great. Very comfortable. 3 colors, but no other that I like. Would order another if they had more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Roche

customer_reviews.title: Finally, A Shoe That Fits!
customer_reviews.text: After numerous returns I now have casual shoes that I can slip into without any issues and they are comfortable as well! I have some feet problems and I find that most shoes are hard to get on but these are super easy. I got a wide just to make sure I could and they may be a bit too wide but I'll take that.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Bad durability
customer_reviews.text: I walk a ton and I was looking for something comfortable. The padding in the shoe almost immediately starts to slide to the left on my left foot creating a bump and giving me blisters. Not long after I have already developed a huge hole in that side of the shoe. If there is any water in the area of the shoe it sucks it up like a sponge. I’ll spend money on Merrill’s for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good looking casual shoe. I wear these all day working around the house, yard and workshop and the occasional errand. Wouldn't wear them out to dinner, for me they're a replacement for a tennis shoe. Since they're a "Relaxed Fit" I probably wouldn't order them in wide again even though in normal shoes and boots I need wide. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely comfortable shoes. They fit when I first put them ...
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable shoes. They fit when I first put them on, but within a few days of use, they actually felt a little loose. I will order a half size smaller if I order again, but I am still comfortably wearing the shoes daily at school, and my foot fatigue has lessened greatly. As a teacher on my feet all day, comfortable shoes are a must, and these fit the bill. Plus, a couple of my students commented that they looked cool, so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: sixpence-guy

customer_reviews.title: These shoes absolutely kill my feet
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, I'm wondering if they are knock offs. I wore them twice, my knees sore I'll never wear them again. I have exactly the same model (different color) that I purchased somewhere else, and they are wonderfully comfortable. Strange because the ratings here are so good. Would never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: papayamon

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Equalizer Double Play Slip-On Loafer
product_meta.description: Engineered mesh slip-on with gel infused memory foam. The shoe has a soft fabric shoe lining ; 1 1/4 inch heel height
